title: Darwin's Dragons
description: 1835. Cabin boy Syms Covington is on the voyage of a lifetime to the Galapagos Islands with the world-famous scientist Charles Darwin. But when Syms falls overboard during a huge storm, he washes up on an unexplored island. Stranded there, he makes a discovery that could change the world ... Now it's not just his own survival at stake - the future of an undiscovered species is in his hands. How to Train Your Dragon meets natural history - with real science!
author: Lindsay Galvin
